successes.title: The uKeg Pressurized Growler for Fresh Beer

*Stretch Reward* Brewery Tour Package -
- June 26 and 27, 2015
A weekend in Portland and brewery tour of Portland with the GrowlerWerks team. Friday and Saturday Night at the Crystal Hotel in downtown Portland, a Brewvana hosted brewery tour of some of our favorite local breweries (actual beer not included), and a visit to the GrowlerWerks design center to pick up the uKeg of your choice.
uKeg 64 Reseller's 12-Pack. Includes twelve (12) uKeg 64's (planned retail $119). Additional charge for shipping, we will contact you separately.
uKeg 128 Reseller's 12-Pack. Includes twelve (12) uKeg 128's (planned retail $149). Additional charge for shipping, we will contact you separately.
